title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Foundations of Reinforced Concrete Column and Pier Design Based on Artificial Neural Networks (ANN)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering mathematics and structural mechanics concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the procedure for applying an ANN (Artificial Neural Network) model in the design of reinforced concrete columns with rectangular/circular cross-sections.
Learners can practice identifying inappropriate input data using an auxiliary ANN.
Learners can predict the design performance of T-beams and singly reinforced rectangular beams under given load conditions with over 90% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
